Package project2

Class Date

java.lang.Object
project2.Date
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Comparable<Date>
public class Date
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Date>
Date class implements all calculations for valid dates
Author:
Aarsh, Hersh

    • compareTo

      public int compareTo​(Date d)
      Compares if dates are before each other, ahead of each other or the same
      Specified by:
      compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable<Date>
      Parameters:
      d - the Date to be compared
      Returns:
      int -1 if Date d is less, 1 if greater, and 0 if same

    • isValid

      public boolean isValid()
      Checks if date is a valid calendar date Also if leap year, checks if February has the right number of days
      Returns:
      true if date is a valid calendar date, false otherwise
